comments.author: mitchell.field@live.com.au
comments.creator: mitchell.field@live.com.au
comments.text: If nsinstall on Windows can't create a hard link, such as when the source and target are on different drives, it prints a warning and falls back to copying. This potentially spams the console with thousands of non-fatal warnings over the course of a build.
comments.raw_text: If nsinstall on Windows can't create a hard link, such as when the source and target are on different drives, it prints a warning and falls back to copying. This potentially spams the console with thousands of non-fatal warnings over the course of a build.
